## Utils.isLocalPkg() method

Is the `mn` a `local package` name.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
isLocalPkg(mn: string): boolean;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  mn | string | The <code>module</code> name to be test |

<b>Returns:</b>

boolean

true if the `mn` is a `local package` name
